    def popupColorPicker(self):
        # Can pass in current color with: color = (255, 0, 0)
        color = askcolor(
            parent = self.interior(),
            # Initialize it to current color
            initialcolor = tuple(self.get()[:3]))[0]
        if color:
            self.set((color[0], color[1], color[2], self.getAt(3)))
